trans-unit.source: Specifies the network resource access that is granted to code.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o acesso de recursos de rede é concedido ao código.

trans-unit.source: This class is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Security.Policy.NetCodeGroup> class to control how executing code can connect back to the site it was downloaded from.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada em conjunto com o <xref:System.Security.Policy.NetCodeGroup>classe para controlar como executando código pode se conectar novamente ao site ele tiver sido baixado de.</xref:System.Security.Policy.NetCodeGroup>

trans-unit.source: These classes provide programmatic control of the <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> granted to executing code that controls what schemes and ports the code can use access its origin site.
trans-unit.target: Essas classes fornecem controle programático do <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>concedida para a execução de código que controla quais esquemas e portas pode usar o código acessar seu site de origem.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: You can specify scheme and port pairs that are permitted based on the scheme in the URL where the code originates.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar o esquema e a porta pares que são permitidas com base no esquema de URL em que o código é originado.

trans-unit.source: To create a CodeConnectAccess object based on the code's origin scheme, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um objeto CodeConnectAccess com base no esquema de origem do código, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a CodeConnectAccess object that can use any scheme but is restricted by port, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um objeto de CodeConnectAccess que pode usar qualquer esquema, mas é restrito por porta, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A> property is set using the `allowScheme` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A>propriedade é definida usando o `allowScheme` parâmetro.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scheme is converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: O esquema é convertido em minúsculas.

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A> controls the scheme that executing code can use to connect to a network resource.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A>controla o esquema de execução de código pode usar para se conectar a um recurso de rede.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A> property is set using the `allowPort` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A>propriedade é definida usando o `allowPort` parâmetro.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A> controls the port that executing code can use to connect to a network resource.
trans-unit.target: O valor de <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A>controla a porta que executa o código pode usar para se conectar a um recurso de rede.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URI scheme represented by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: O esquema URI representado pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The port represented by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A porta representada pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: allowScheme is .
trans-unit.target: allowSchemeis .

trans-unit.source: -or- allowScheme is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowScheme é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: -or- allowScheme contains characters that are not permitted in schemes.
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowScheme contém caracteres que não são permitidos em esquemas.

trans-unit.source: -or- allowPort is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowPort é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- allowPort is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowPort é maior que 65.535.

trans-unit.source: Contains the string value that represents the scheme wildcard.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor de cadeia de caracteres que representa o caractere curinga de esquema.

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to constructing a <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> object using this value, you can call the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> object that represents a specified port and any scheme.
trans-unit.target: Como uma alternativa para construir um <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>objeto usando este valor, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A>método para obter um <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>objeto que representa qualquer esquema e uma porta especificada.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateAnySchemeAccess%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is "*".
trans-unit.target: O valor desse campo é "*".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> instance that represents access to the specified port using any scheme.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> instância que representa o acesso à porta especificada usando qualquer esquema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> instance returned by this method uses the scheme wildcard value <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> ("*") to represent the scheme.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>instância retornada por este método usa o valor de curinga de esquema <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>("*") para representar o esquema.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The port represented by the returned instance.
trans-unit.target: A porta representada pela instância retornada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> instance for the specified port.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> instância para a porta especificada.

trans-unit.source: allowPort is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: allowPorté menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- allowPort is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowPort é maior que 65.535.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> instance that represents access to the specified port using the code's scheme of origin.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> instância que representa o acesso à porta especificada usando o esquema do código de origem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> instance returned by this method has the scheme value <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>instância retornada por este método tem o valor de esquema <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The origin scheme is the scheme value from the URI where the code originated.
trans-unit.target: O esquema de origem é o valor de esquema do URI onde o código foi originado.

trans-unit.source: The port represented by the returned instance.
trans-unit.target: A porta representada pela instância retornada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> instance for the specified port.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> instância para a porta especificada.

trans-unit.source: allowPort is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: allowPorté menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- allowPort is greater than 65,535.
trans-unit.target: - ou - allowPort é maior que 65.535.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value used to represent the default port.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor usado para representar a porta padrão.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> object that has the default port for a specified scheme, use this field as the `allowPort` parameter of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>objeto que tem a porta padrão para um esquema especificado, use esse campo como o `allowPort` parâmetro o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is -3.
trans-unit.target: O valor desse campo é -3.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether two <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> objects represent the same scheme and port.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se dois <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> representar o mesmo esquema e a porta.

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> objects are equal if their <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A> property values are equal.
trans-unit.target: Dois <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>objetos são iguais se seus <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A>e <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A>valores de propriedade são iguais.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Port%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser comparado ao atual <xref href="System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two objects represent the same scheme and port; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os dois objetos representarem o mesmo esquema e uma porta. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: Serve como uma função de hash para um tipo específico.

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash para <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> atual

trans-unit.source: Contains the value used to represent the port value in the URI where code originated.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor usado para representar o valor da porta no URI de origem do código.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess> object that has the same port as the port in the executing code's URL evidence, use this field as the `allowPort` parameter of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>objeto que tem a mesma porta como a porta na evidência de URL do código em execução, use este campo como o `allowPort` parâmetro o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is -4.
trans-unit.target: O valor desse campo é -4.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Contains the value used to represent the scheme in the URL where the code originated.
trans-unit.target: Contém o valor usado para representar o esquema de URL em que o código foi originada.

trans-unit.source: Do not use this field with the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Não use esse campo com o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, use o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A>método.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.CreateOriginSchemeAccess%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is "$origin".
trans-unit.target: O valor desse campo é "$origin".

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the port represented by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a porta representada pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Port values are between 0 and 65,535.
trans-unit.target: Valores de porta estão entre 0 e 65.535.

trans-unit.source: The port value is specified when you create an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.
trans-unit.target: O valor da porta é especificado quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Int32> value that identifies a computer port used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme*> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>valor que identifica uma porta de computador usada em conjunto com o <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme*>propriedade.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess.Scheme*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI scheme represented by the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o esquema URI representado pela instância atual.

trans-unit.source: The scheme value is specified when you create an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de esquema é especificado quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.CodeConnectAccess>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that identifies a URI scheme, converted to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que identifica um esquema URI, convertido em minúsculas.</xref:System.String>
